text: Khartoum is a 1966 British historical war adventure epic movie directed by Basil Dearden. It stars Charlton Heston, Laurence Olivier, Nigel Green, Alexander Knox, Zia Mohyeddin, Johnny Sekka, Richard Johnson, Ralph Michael, Douglas Wilmer and Ralph Richardson. It was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1967. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1966 war movies Category:1966 adventure movies Category:1960s historical movies Category:1960s epic movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British war movies Category:Movies directed by Basil Dearden Category:Movies set in the 1880s Category:Movies set in Egypt Category:Movies set in Sudan Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies about jihadism
title: Khartoum (movie)
